title: LEASE TO OWN HOMES
posting_body: ['KEY TO YOUR NEW HOME!', ' This tri-level home has it all!', 'Upon entering, you’ll enjoy an open living area with wall-mounted electric fireplace!', 'Plus, there’s the kitchen with lots of cabinet space and all appliances are included!', 'Walk down a few steps to the lower level into the cozy family room with gas fireplace for those cool Colorado evenings!', 'Enjoy the large, newly landscaped backyard with a big concrete patio – perfect for entertaining and relaxing!', 'There’s a two-car attached garage, roof is only three years old and radon system in basement!', '*  HOUSEHOLD INCOME OF $80,000', '*  CREDIT SCORE AS LOW AS 620', '*  SELF EMPLOYED AND UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION', 'OK', '*  2 MONTH REFUNDABLE SECURITY DEPOSIT', '*  ROOMMATES OK', '*  DOGS & CATS OK', '**  Due to HIGH demand of this GREAT program, subject homes may be unavailable upon resident approval']
